summary: Completed e2e testing for Service Provider (Remesas) feature. All 15 backend API tests passed (100%). Frontend UI tests passed - provider portal, admin dashboard, and homepage service offers all working correctly.

issues: [Layout children] warnings about non-existent routes 'destinations' and 'destination-details'

Backend has 15 passing tests covering: health, public service offers, provider registration, login, offers CRUD, admin provider management. Frontend tested: homepage shows service offers section with WhatsApp contact buttons, provider portal works for login/register/dashboard/offers, admin dashboard shows 'Proveedores de Servicios' button.
